verses.text: Yictax yichb’anel, manh jantacoc yaelal ix yak'och eb' ajk'ol t'a quib'anh a onh israel onh tik. Yuj chi' a ticnaic calec icha tik:
Manhxo jantacoc yaelal ix yak'och eb' ajk'ol t'a quib'anh yictax t'a yichb’anel, palta maj tzak'vanlaj chi' t'ayonh.
Ixlajwi yich co patic smak'an eb', te niwan chequel ix aj staji schiq'uil yich co patic chi' yuj eb'.
Axo Jehová, tojol toni, ha' ix onh colan t'a yol sk'ab' eb' sk'ulan chucal chi', xco chiocab'i.
Ha eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'a Sion, q'uixvocab' eb', b'atocab' eb' elelal.
Icha tz'aj anh ank'ultak sq'uib' t'a yib'anh pat, jab'nhej sq'uib' steel, elanhchamel stacjieli, ichocab' ta' tz'aj eb'.
Ha anh ank'ultak chi', max co jochlaj anh, max co tzek'paxlaj anh t'a manojail.
Manh ol yal-laj eb' anima tzek' t'a stz'ey anh ank'ultak chi': Yak'ocab' syaxilal Jehová t'a yib'anh anh. Sco k'an yaxilal t'a yib'anh anh, manh xchioc eb'.
